title: When is MvM Going to be Released?
body: This question is probably already answered, but I would like to have the release date, an estimate if nothing else, of Mechs vs. Minions release date.

replies.body:
October 13th at 11:00am PDT.  If you want to learn more, head over to:

www.mechsvsminions.com

is yasou still broken watch at youtube@redmercy{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
